key_points: Authorities are searching for Gabby Petito, a 22-year-old woman last seen traveling through Utah and Wyoming with her boyfriend.
Gabby Petito embarked on a cross-country trip with her boyfriend on July 2 from Blue Point, New York.
The couple documented their trip on social media, visiting places like Colorado, Southern Utah, Arches National Park, and Canyonlands National Park.
Petito's Instagram posts slowed down towards the end of August, with the last communication on August 30 being uncertain.
The last known location of Petito was Salt Lake City on August 21, confirmed through an Uber Eats order placed by her father.
Petito's parents believe the couple left Salt Lake City for Grand Teton National Park around August 24, spending no more than two days there.
Communication between Petito and her mother became sporadic after August 24, with the nature of Petito's relationship with her boyfriend in question.
The Suffolk County Police Department confirmed the retrieval of the van used by the couple but provided no information on the boyfriend's whereabouts.
A case has officially been opened by the Suffolk County Police Department, and the public is urged to provide information.
Petito's parents have established a Facebook page for updates and a GoFundMe page to help with expenses.
